lore: Maokai is a rageful, towering treant who fights the unnatural horrors of the Shadow Isles. He was twisted into a force of vengeance after a magical cataclysm destroyed his home, surviving undeath only through the Waters of Life infused within his heartwood. Once a peaceful nature spirit, Maokai now furiously battles to banish the scourge of unlife from the Shadow Isles and restore his home to its former beauty.
title: the Twisted Treant
blurb: Maokai is a rageful, towering treant who fights the unnatural horrors of the Shadow Isles. He was twisted into a force of vengeance after a magical cataclysm destroyed his home, surviving undeath only through the Waters of Life infused within his...
allytips: Saplings can be tossed into brush for empowered effect - but don't stack well.
Try looking for flanks or other situations where Nature's Grasp is unavoidable or takes enemies by surprise.
Maokai's passive makes him extremely durable against focus fire from spells - so long as he can still basic attack something.

passive.name: Sap Magic
passive.description: Maokai's basic attack also heal him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Maokai's basic attack also heal him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

enemytips: Saplings will chase the first enemy that gets too close, but detonate after a few seconds or if they collide with other enemies. Be especially careful around brush sapling, as they are much more dangerous.
The cooldown on Maokai's self healing is heavily gated on how many time you hit him with spells. Careful about wasting abilities on him.
Maokai will avoid taking damage while he's using Twisted Advance, so don't waste your spells.
name: Maokai

spells.name: Bramble Smash
spells.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, releasing a shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked away from him and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed briefly.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, releasing a shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked away from him and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed briefly.

spells.name: Twisted Advance
spells.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
spells.tooltip:
Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target.

Upon arrival, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and roots the target for {{ e2 }} second(s).
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and roots the target for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Sapling Toss
spells.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
spells.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for {{ f1 }} seconds. Saplings will chase nearby enemies, detonating on proximity, dealing {{ e1 }} +{{ e8 }}% [+{{ a1 }}%] Target Max Health magic damage and slowing enemies struck by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Saplings placed in brush last for {{ f2 }} seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing double damage over {{ e6 }} seconds to all enemies hit.

Maximum {{ e4 }} Damage to non-Champions, doubled for brush.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for {{ f1 }} seconds. Saplings will chase nearby enemies, detonating on proximity, dealing {{ e1 }} +{{ e8 }}% [+{{ a1 }}%] Target Max Health magic damage and slowing enemies struck by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. Saplings placed in brush last for {{ f2 }} seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing double damage over {{ e6 }} seconds to all enemies hit. Maximum {{ e4 }} Damage to non-Champions, doubled for brush.

spells.name: Nature's Grasp
spells.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
spells.tooltip: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting any enemies struck for ({{ e2 }} to {{ e2 }}) seconds, increasing with distance travelled.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting any enemies struck for ({{ e2 }} to {{ e2 }}) seconds, increasing with distance travelled.
